Title: school_closure
Description: require closing (only some levels or categories, eg just high school, or just public schools)

Title: school_closure
Description: recommend closing or all schools open with alterations

Title: school_closure
Description: require closing (only some levels or categories, eg just high school, or just public schools)

Title: workplace_closure
Description: require closing (or work from home) for some sectors or categories of workers

Title: workplace_closure
Description: require closing (or work from home) for all-but-essential workplaces (eg grocery stores, doctors)

Title: restrictions_on_gatherings
Description: restrictions on gatherings of 10 people or less

Title: close_public_transport
Description: recommend closing (or significantly reduce volume/route/means of transport available)

Title: stay_at_home
Description: require not leaving house with exceptions for daily exercise, grocery shopping, and 'essential' trips

Title: restrictions_internal_mvt
Description: recommend not to travel between regions/cities

Title: intern_travel_control
Description: ban on all regions or total border closure

Title: contact_tracing
Description: limited contact tracing; not done for all cases

Title: contact_tracing
Description: comprehensive contact tracing; done for all identified cases

Title: contact_tracing
Description: limited contact tracing; not done for all cases

Title: facial_coverings
Description: facial covering required in some specified shared/public spaces outside the home with other people present, or some situations when social distancing not possible
